news.title: Syria leader vows to protect Druze after sectarian violence prompts Israeli strikes
news.summary: Ahmed al-Sharaa spoke after Israel said it would destroy government forces it accused of attacking Druze in Syria.

news.title: Labour taking Abbott's renewed comments about racism 'incredibly seriously'
news.summary: The veteran Labour MP has told the BBC she stands by comments that led to a year-long suspension from the party.

news.title: Tomorrowland organisers say festival will go ahead after fire destroys main stage
news.summary: Tens of thousands of campers arrive at the Belgium site as festival managers focus on "finding solutions".

news.title: Suspension from Labour doesn't mean I'm silenced, MP says
news.summary: Rachael Maskell says the government should be doing "more listening" to its backbenchers.

news.title: Several injured after Gaza church struck, patriarchate says
news.summary: The Israeli military said it was aware of the reports that the Church of the Holy Family was hit by Israeli artillery shells.

news.title: Ariana Grande tells fans she's not abandoning music after Dr Seuss film casting
news.summary: The US singer insists there's still room for music after being cast in another film this week.

news.title: Arsenal sign Liverpool's Olivia Smith in most expensive deal in women's football
news.summary: Canada forward Olivia Smith becomes the most expensive signing in women's football history by completing a Â£1m move from Liverpool.

news.title: UK jobs market weakens as unemployment rate rises
news.summary: The official data shows wage growth has slowed while the number of vacancies continues to fall.

news.title: Starmer stamps authority with MP suspensions, but risks appearing vindictive
news.summary: Senior officials say the sackings came after repeated organising against the government.

news.title: Patience thins among MAGA loyalists for Trump to meet demands on Epstein
news.summary: Trump supporters have a new priority on their minds - the release of the so-called Jeffrey Epstein files.
